== Peaches and Cream ==
''Also quite delicious!''
----

This is an alternate window decoration for the Kin GNOME theme.

=== Screenshots ===

{| class="wikitable"
|-
| <style="text-align: center;"> <nowiki>[[attachment:Peaches-and-Cream-Desktop-01.png|<nowiki>[[File:Peaches-and-Cream-Desktop-01-Thumbnail.png]]</nowiki></nowiki>]]
|-
| <nowiki>[[attachment:Peaches-and-Cream-Desktop-01.png|Fullsize]]</nowiki> - Peaches and Cream
|}

This theme package requires the Kin theme and the GNOME-Ubuntu icon theme to be installed. If you do not want to use the GNOME-Ubuntu icons customise the theme in the theme chooser and try another icon set like Humanity.
